column5: Okay, I admit that I'm not very tech savvy. But I have a question for those that administer this site. Is there not a way for the site to automatically adjust the size of the photos like it does on facebook? I might be way out there but loading pictures onto facebook seems so easy compared to fishing forums. What's the difference? Why is there a size limit on this site?
Because people will upload 10MB pictures without even knowing it, lol  Use Photobucket.. It's free and will auto resize for you.
yep, It is too much of a pain, thus no pics from me.  Got 100 to share after moose hunt, but don't have time to resize even one.  no loss I suppose.
as bill said make a photo bucket account, upload picture and post the link into the thread bingo bango done
Using a hosting site like photobucket is the only way to go!
I'm not very tech savvy and I went the photobucket route with no problems !
